channel.title: WP-CLI and Linux Shell Basics on sitebay Guides & Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in WP-CLI and Linux Shell Basics on sitebay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: Using the Terminal for SiteBay WordPress Hosting
item.description:
Shell Basics for SiteBay WordPress Hosting

The shell, also known as the command line interface (CLI), is a powerhouse for interacting with your SiteBay WordPress hosting environment. It’s your go-to for managing files, running scripts, and performing tasks that keep your site humming. You might already be familiar with the terminal from Linux or Mac’s Terminal.app.

item.title: basic-wp-cli-commands
item.description:
Basic WP-CLI Commands

When managing a WordPress site, using the command line can make tasks quicker and easier. WP-CLI, or WordPress Command Line Interface, is a powerful tool that helps you manage your WordPress sites without using the web browser. Whether you’re looking to add a new user, change your password, or install plugins, here’s how you can do it using WP-CLI.

item.title: Code Server Linux Commands
item.description: We’re here to turn you into a command line ninja, managing your WordPress site like you were born to do it.

item.title: How to Copy Files and Directories
item.description:
Copying Files and Directories in SiteBay

Whether you’re new to managing a WordPress site on SiteBay or you’ve been at it for a while, knowing how to handle files is crucial. One basic task you’ll find yourself doing often is copying files and directories. This guide will break down how to use the cp command on your SiteBay environment, ensuring you’re prepared to copy anything from a single file to an entire directory with ease.

item.title: Introduction to SiteBay Concepts
item.description:
Dive Into SiteBay: Your WordPress Hosting Powerhouse

Welcome to SiteBay, where WordPress hosting meets Kubernetes magic, analytics by Posthog, and more. If you thought driving an automatic car was easy, wait until you get the hang of SiteBay. It’s like having an automatic car with a self-driving feature. This guide will get you cozy with the essentials, making you a WordPress wizard in no time.
